name: Motley's Music Discs
description: This is a mod adding my favorite songs to Minecraft as 8-bit music discs! Featuring music by Lovejoy, Bo Burnham, and more, this is a mod for my friends and I to listen to some tunes. 8-bit covers by various artists (more information in credits). Subscribe to my YouTube channel at youtube.com/gracemotley
authors: Mod by GraceMotley. Music by Koopastar, Disphing, et al.
